## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c2d2c0992436650a40d64d021e56094cc48a801a15c5afaa60771bdc9e464f7e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'oclip' @ 92.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
